review: It met our expectations to an extent. We are able to see many interesting "partials" of dozens of documentaries, films and TV shows. We really enjoy seeing one to three minutes of an hour-long documentary, so obviously it suits us. An added bonus is that the menu is diabolical; one cannot get back to the main menu of a channel at all. You have to uninstall and reinstall the whole system to get back to each menu every single time. But yes, good apart from that.
author: F. C. Hawke "nzfiona"

review: I think I am going to love it as soon as I get the hang of it.
author: Katherine Sargent

review: easy install and set up.  works as advertised!  great product.
author: Jason P.

review: Why buy a smart TV. when the fire stick turns your TV into one????????
author: greg forsht

review: I was disappointed the fire stick doesn't supply captions.  I am deaf and since netflix also has no captions we were hoping the fire stick would provide captioning.  Set up was fairly easy and the movie list is impressive.  Most of our favorite BBC programs are at no added charge on netflix but must be purchased on the fire stick.  The closed captioning was what we were looking for.
author: Oopie
